biome.name: Desolate
biome.description: Scorching temperatures, high winds, and low precipitation cause a near-constant cycle of fires to sweep this planet, punctuated by short bursts of lush rebirth between infernos.

hazards.name: Intense Heat
hazards.description: High temperatures increase stamina drain and speed up heat buildup in weapons.

hazards.name: Fire Tornadoes
hazards.description: Planet is ravaged by deadly fire tornadoes.

biome.name: Winter
biome.description: Submerged in eternal winter, this world's frosty peaks glimmer in the light of its too-distant star.

hazards.name: Extreme Cold
hazards.description: Icy temperatures reduce rate of fire and delay heat buildup in weapons.

hazards.name: Blizzards
hazards.description: Intense blizzard reduce mobility and moderately reduce visibility for both enemy and friendly units.

biome.name: Jungle
biome.description: Abundant with life, this wet planet is covered in deep oceans, thick forests, and tall grasses.

hazards.name: Volcanic Activity
hazards.description: Volcanoes throw burning rocks around this planet.

biome.name: Toxic
biome.description: Dense, toxic fumes from deep within the planet's crust seep out of cracks in the earth and coat the ground in a sickly haze.

hazards.name: Intense Heat
hazards.description: High temperatures increase stamina drain and speed up heat buildup in weapons.

biome.name: Icemoss
biome.description: Ice and moss-covered rock can be found across most of the surface of this planet.

hazards.name: Extreme Cold
hazards.description: Icy temperatures reduce rate of fire and delay heat buildup in weapons.

biome.name: Tundra
biome.description: A perenially chilly climate has allowed short, colourful shrubs to flourish across this planet's surface.

hazards.name: None
hazards.description: This planet's environment is not yet known, or has no environmental modifiers.

biome.name: Icemoss
biome.description: Ice and moss-covered rock can be found across most of the surface of this planet.

hazards.name: Extreme Cold
hazards.description: Icy temperatures reduce rate of fire and delay heat buildup in weapons.
